overview: Hot man-sex in every corner, you can smell the testosterone. From wild to wild, it all goes down at The Club.  Shot inside Florida's infamous Club Ft. Lauderdale, The Club features the delicious, young Jacque Pierr and Gay Superstar Spencer Reed, leading a cast of dirty pigs as they fuck their way through locker rooms, gyms, showers, and sling rooms.  Club Ft. Lauderdale combined with the raunch and filth that is the trademark of Chi Chi LaRue...have you got your membership to The Club?
title: The Club
